articles.author: Jagmeet Singh
articles.title: India to launch solar observatory mission Aditya-L1 this week - TechCrunch

articles.content:
India is launching its first space-based solar observatory mission called Aditya-L1 to study the sun just days after the successful landingof the country’s moon rover mission Chandrayaan-3.
